attributes.action: To Make Student cards available for apprenticeships.
attributes.background: If your a Apprentice you aren't entitled to much.You have to pay full price on almost everything and you don't get a discount card.But someone the same age who's a student gets a discount.With a Apprenticeship you Still learn on the job so why cant we be considered as students and get a studentcard.

rejection.details:
The UK Government isn't responsible for student discount cards. 

The National Union of Students, which isn't the responsibility of the Government and Parliament, does issue student cards. The NUS offers a card for apprentices - you can find out more about this here:

https://www.nus.org.uk/en/nus-extra/nus-apprentice-extra-card/
